casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Richard W. WILLIAMS 291P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 28, 2017 Richard W. Williams, for Williams, Richard W. Kristin Jo Uicker, Assistant Attorney General, Roger A. Echols, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th of August 2017 by Defendant for Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of September 2017."

Beasley, J. and Morgan, J. recused
